definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

ninth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/ninth in order/letter "I" or Roman "IX" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 345°/nona

sentences.english: You may vote who sever side you like.
sentences.chinese: 你可以投票選你喜歡的任一方。

sentences.english: Through the trial, was initially arrested the two men and Lim Yang.
sentences.chinese: 通過審訊，最初被抓獲的兩男子爲任某和楊某。

sentences.english: Any plant of the genus hoya having fleshy leaves and usually nectariferous flowers.
sentences.chinese: 球蘭屬的任一種植物，肉質葉，花朵通常分泌蜜汁。

sentences.english: Standard linings are supplied in either 2oz or 4oz machine washable FR polyester.
sentences.chinese: 提供標準的內膽是在任一盎司或阻燃聚酯安士機洗。

sentences.english: Chen Qiufa was appointed Deputy Secretary of CPC Party Leadership Group of Ministry of Industry and Information Technology.
sentences.chinese: 陳求發任工業和信息化部黨組副書記。

sentences.english: When you know where you re headed, you can choose any route to get there.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你知道了目標，路徑就可以任你挑選了。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith was succeeded by Mrs. Jones as treasurer.
sentences.chinese: 瓊斯夫人繼史密斯先生任會計。

sentences.english: During Bush's tenure, the US economy experienced only 2% job growth.
sentences.chinese: 布什總統在任期間，美國經濟經歷了只有2%的增長。

sentences.english: Farmer film, who holding the post of to look to feel is sportive.
sentences.chinese: 農民拍電影，任誰看了都覺得是鬧着玩的。

sentences.english: What Beijing will do about the unofficial financial system is anyone's guess at this point.
sentences.chinese: 北京如何處理這些非官方債務，任誰都猜得到。

sentences.english: Dancing shakes, his voice is high, the carnival night is yours.
sentences.chinese: 舞姿搖搖，嗓門高高，狂歡夜任你逍遙。

sentences.english: He turns you adrift on the world with surprising alacrity.
sentences.chinese: 他以令人驚奇的喜愛任你在世上漂泊。

sentences.english: Want to hide yourself up, term who also cannot find, including myself.
sentences.chinese: 想把自己隱藏起來，任誰也找不到，包括自己。

sentences.english: He chose history as his major course of study and, upon graduation, stayed on as a teaching assistant in the university's Department of Ethnology.
sentences.chinese: 他選擇了歷史專業，並於畢業後留在民族學系任助教。

sentences.english: The universe is very big, let fly, loaded with joy, return.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙很大，任飛翔，滿載歡樂，回航。

sentences.english: I'm not sure yet, it is she, who's responsible for my sprain !
sentences.chinese: 我不確信是她嗎，誰爲我的腿來負責任。
